addAcct: Fill in the instance domain (for example, mastodon.social)
codesetupwarn: Uncheck to skip pasting code. (Login to Mastodon on Windows or macOS) (Recommended: pcheck)
accessTokenSetup: Use access token to login (click after filling in the access-token in the box: Advanced)
haveExported: Having the exported file of TheDesk, click here to go to the settings page
